greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, 3<=k<=n: T(n,k) = smallest prime p such that 2*k-p and 2*n-p are prime, T(n,k) = 0 if no such p exists.
link: Index entries for sequences related to Goldbach conjecture
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Goldbach Partition
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 14 2006
